title: Sell Macallan
metaDescription: Sell your Macallan whisky collection to Proof Cellars. We buy rare, vintage, and limited edition Macallan bottles. Direct offers with no consignment fees.
heroSubhead: We buy Macallan whisky directly - from rare vintages to limited editions.
introParagraph: Macallan is one of the most collectible single malt scotch whiskies in the world. We buy Macallan bottles directly, from vintage releases to limited editions. Submit photos and details, receive an offer, and get paid after we verify your bottles - no consignment or auction fees.
whatWeBuy: Macallan Sherry Oak and Double Cask releases
whatWeDoNotBuy: Common current releases (12 Year standard expressions)
Items we cannot legally purchase in your state
conditionNotes: Macallan bottles are evaluated based on fill level, seal condition, label presentation, and overall bottle condition. Original packaging - boxes, tubes, and certificates - significantly impacts value for collectible releases. Vintage bottles may show appropriate age wear, but leakage or seal damage typically disqualifies a bottle.
pricingFactors: Current market demand and recent transactions
